en: Your health\nWhen it reaches 0, you die
Enemies in this wave attack you,\ndestroying themselves in the process
ru: Противники в этой волне атакуют,\nпринося себя в жертву

en: Enemies is this wave move towards you
ru: Противники в этой волне двигаются к тебе

en:
Your OVERLOAD meter
Using powers fills it
When full, your abilities unlock hidden potential,
but any undefended damage kills you
Maximum depends on your health
ru:
Счётчик ПЕРЕГРУЗКИ
Использование умений заполняет его
Когда счётчик полон, твои умения становятся сильнее,
но любой незаблокированный урон убивает тебя

en: 4 dmg to any enemy in front wave
1 damage to target in first wave; 2 defend
1-4 dmg to 1 enemy, farther enemies take more dmg
1 dmg to a target and its neighbors
2 dmg to target, 1 dmg to neighbors in same wave
Target enemy attacks an enemy behind it.\n(Cannot target Thiefs)
Pull target one wave closer; Defend 1 for each enemy in 1st wave\n(Target cannot be in 1st wave, cannot have any other enemies in front of it)
4 dmg to any enemy in front wave and 2 dmg to enemy right behind it
1 damage to target in first wave; 3 defend
1-4 dmg to 1 enemy, farther enemies take more dmg; defend based on damage dealt
1 dmg to all enemies in target square
1 dmg to target; 1 dmg to another random enemy
2 dmg to target, 1 dmg to other enemies in same wave

Target enemy attacks an enemy behind it, dealing double damage.
(Cannot target Thiefs)
Pull target one wave closer; Defend 2 for each enemy in 1st wave\n(Target cannot be in 1st wave, cannot have any other enemies in front of it)
